# Model description
```{r load_model}
library(ProjectTemplate)
library(knitr)
load.project()
run.project()

current_model <- model_0
```


# Evaluate model fit

```{r model_0_summary}
glance(current_model) %>% kable()
summary(current_model)$coefficients %>% kable()
```

# Evaluate model performance

```{r}
pred <- predict(current_model, biom_data_test)
actual <- biom_data_test$env_material
confusionMatrix(pred, actual) %>% .$overall
```
